mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_hospital_user( id, sys_user_id, sys_office_id, create_date, update_date, easemobID, easemobPassword ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sysUserID}, #{sysOfficeID}, now(), now(), #{easemobID}, #{easemobPassword} )
mapper.select: select shu.id,shu.sys_user_id as sysUserID, so.name as officeName,shu.sys_office_id as sysOfficeID, shur.role_id as sysRoleID,su.name as name, su.phone as phone,shu.create_date as createDate, shu.update_date as updateDate,shu.loginToken as loginToken, shu.easemobID as easemobID,shu.easemobPassword as easemobPassword, su.gender,su.photo from sys_hospital_user shu inner join sys_user su on shu.sys_user_id=su.id inner join sys_office so on shu.sys_office_id=so.id inner join sys_hospital_user_role shur on shur.sys_hospital_user_id=shu.id where su.id=#{sysUserID}

select shu.id,shu.sys_user_id as sysUserID, so.name as officeName,shu.sys_office_id as sysOfficeID, shur.role_id as sysRoleID,su.name as name, su.phone as phone,shu.create_date as createDate, shu.update_date as updateDate,shu.loginToken as loginToken, shu.easemobID as easemobID,shu.easemobPassword as easemobPassword, su.gender,su.photo from sys_hospital_user shu inner join sys_user su on shu.sys_user_id=su.id inner join sys_office so on shu.sys_office_id=so.id inner join sys_hospital_user_role shur on shur.sys_hospital_user_id=shu.id where su.del_flag !='1'
